notes: This map illustrates potential satellite-detected structures in Cajobabo town and the surrounding area in Guantanamo Province, Cuba. The UNITAR-UNOSAT analysis used a Pleiades satellite image, acquired on the 7 of October, 2016. The analysis identified 450 damaged structures within the map extent of which 211 were identified inside the town of Cajobabo. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR - UNOSAT.
